div.head: Foreword
div.p: The pages in this foreword have Roman page numbers, just to demonstrate the @n attribute is independent from the page numbering.
For demonstration purposes, we include these few lines of verse from the beginning of “Macbeth”:

lg.l: When shall we three meet again?
In thunder, lightning, or in rain?
When the battle's lost and won.
That will be ere the set of sun.
